Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: We take it for granted here on Earth, but it's in short supply in the rest of the solar system, at least in liquid form. The search for water is actually the search for life, and that search is taking us to some unusual places, including a moon of Saturn that is shooting liquid water into space.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Gravity sucks but where would we be with out it. Scientists are now probing to detect gravity waves in space. They are also mapping the gravity patterns of the moon for the first time.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the creation legends of Naikoon Provincial Park, to rich sea lion colonies, and remote lighthouses - Haida Gwaii's northern coastlines record an epic journey.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: BLONDIE'S NEW YORK
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the span of just a few years, Blondie went from a band fighting for punk cred at CBGB to international superstardom, thanks in large part to one album: Parallel Lines. What was the secret behind its success? How did it all come together...and nearly fall apart? Enter the recording studio with Blondie's frontwoman and namesake, Debbie Harry, the rest of the band, and producer Mike Chapman. Their conversations reveal the real stories behind iconic hits like "Heart of Glass" and "One Way or Another" and how they launched punk music into the mainstream.

Clip.Title: THE ACCORDION KINGS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every 10 years, Columbia's top accordion virtuosi gather to compete in a fierce musical battle to decide the undisputed Accordion King.

Clip.Title: PHIL COLLINS: GOING BACK TO DETROIT
Clip.Episode: Phil Collins: Going Back to Detroit
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Phil Collins back to the birthplace of Motown, as he joins the Funk Brothers for one soul-filled night of legendary music.

Clip.Title: PLAY ON JOHN: A LIFE IN MUSIC
Clip.Episode: Play on John: A Life in Music
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before Bob Dylan and The Band there was John Chohen: the man who saved and celebrated American Folk music.

Clip.Title: THE ACCORDION KINGS
